Abraham's prospect Being a sermon preached at the funeral of Mr John Williams, late vicar of Devinnocke, in the parish-church of Llanspithid in the county of Brecon, on the 12th day of June, 1680. By Owen Griffith. Griffith, Owen.
[4], 22 p.
printed for H. Brome, at the Gun in St. Paul's Church-yard, London : M DC LXXXI. [1681]
Running title: A funeral sermon. Reproduction of the original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London.
=======

[4], 22 p.
printed for H. Brome, at the Gun in St. Paul's Church-yard, London : M DC LXXXI. [1681]
